features.name: JSON Formatter
features.description: Format, minify, and validate JSON data with syntax highlighting

features.name: JWT Decoder
features.description: Decode JWT tokens to view Header, Payload, and expiration time

features.name: Image Resizer
features.description: Resize images, convert formats, and adjust quality in browser

features.name: Image Converter
features.description: Convert images between JPEG, PNG, WebP, AVIF, and GIF formats

features.name: Base64 Converter
features.description: Encode and decode text or files to/from Base64

features.name: URL Parser
features.description: Parse URLs into components and edit query parameters

features.name: UUID Generator
features.description: Generate UUID v1, v4, and ULID with various format options

features.name: Hash Generator
features.description: Generate and compare MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 hashes

features.name: QR Code Generator
features.description: Generate QR codes for URLs, WiFi, contacts, and more

features.name: Color Picker
features.description: Extract colors from images and generate color palettes

features.name: SQL Formatter
features.description: Format SQL queries with support for multiple dialects

features.name: Cron Parser
features.description: Parse cron expressions and predict next execution times

features.name: Markdown Preview
features.description: Live preview Markdown with syntax highlighting support

features.name: Diff Checker
features.description: Compare two texts and visualize the differences

features.name: Regex Tester
features.description: Test regular expressions and see matches in real-time

features.name: Video Compressor
features.description: Compress video files in browser using FFmpeg.wasm

features.name: PDF Toolkit
features.description: Merge, split, compress, and redact PDF files in browser

features.name: OCR Scanner
features.description: Extract text from images using Tesseract.js

features.name: Background Remover
features.description: Remove image backgrounds automatically using AI/ONNX runtime

features.name: OG Image Generator
features.description: Create beautiful Open Graph images for social media sharing

features.name: Command Menu
features.description: Global search and command palette with keyboard shortcuts

features.name: Theme Toggle
features.description: Dark/light mode toggle using next-themes

features.name: Internationalization
features.description: Multi-language support using next-intl

features.name: Tool Pipeline
features.description: Send output from one tool to another

features.name: Workspace
features.description: Save and organize tool outputs in workspaces
